action_details: securing a perimeter around the fire at [36.533285, -6.296589] using vehicles positioned at [36.541871, -6.285121] and [36.532700, -6.302902], managing traffic and checkpoints via planned routes for 4 patrol vehicles (1, 3, 8, 10), ensuring coordination with firefighting efforts, and maintaining communication with emergency services and local authorities to effectively manage the situation and ensure public safety.
